description: This header file declares functions for creating messages related to door lock events, such as addition, removal, and update, used for communicating with a server in a smart door lock system.

methods.name: createDoorLockAddedMessage
methods.description: Creates a message object indicating a new door lock has been added.

methods.name: createDoorLockRemovedMessage
methods.description: Creates a message object indicating a door lock has been removed.

methods.name: createDoorLockUpdatedMessage
methods.description: Creates a message object indicating a door lock has been updated.
